Team4450.Lib

Class SRXMagneticEncoderRelative

  • java.lang.Object
    • Team4450.Lib.SRXMagneticEncoderRelative
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.CounterBase, edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.PIDSource

    public class SRXMagneticEncoderRelative
extends java.lang.Object
implements edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.CounterBase, edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.PIDSource
    Wrapper for SRX Magnetic Encoder used in relative (quadrature) mode.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.CounterBase

        edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.CounterBase.EncodingType

      Create SRMagneticEncoderRelate setting the Talon the encoder is connected to end the wheel diameter of the wheel being monitored.

      • pidGet

        public double pidGet()
        Return the cumulative encoder count since last reset for input to a pid controller. Only displacement (count) implemented.
        Specified by:
        pidGet in interface edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.PIDSource
        Returns:

      • get

        public int get()
        Return the encoder count since last reset. 4096 counts per encoder revolution divided by the scale factor.
        Specified by:
        get in interface edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.CounterBase
        Returns:
        The encoder count.

      • getDistance

        public double getDistance()
        Return the distance in inches the encoder has recorded since last reset. If encoder goes backwards the distance is reduced. Computed from encoder rotations x gear ratio factor x (wheel diameter x 3.13).
        Returns:
        The distance in inches.

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Reset the encoder count.

      • setGearRatio

        public void setGearRatio(double gearRatio)
        Set the gear ratio factor. This is a factor that the encoder rotation is multiplied by to yield the wheel rotation. Defaults to 1.
        Parameters:
        gearRatio - The gear ratio factor to set

      • getScaleFactor

        Returns current encoder count scale factor.
        Returns:
        The scale factor

      • setScaleFactor

        public void setScaleFactor(int scaleFactor)
        Set scaling factor that encoder counts will be divided by to reduce encoder count range.
        Parameters:
        scaleFactor - The scale factor to set.
